review: My experience with Dr. Mansi Khatri was very satisfactory.  The doctor is very patient friendly and very experienced.  My treatment went very smoothly. I appreciate the doctor's narrating the procedure beforehand to me to put my mind at ease. Overall, I am happy with my treatment and would definitely recommend her to others.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Mansi is a wonderful dentist. I am really apprehensive about the treatment. But she calmed me down. She is super friendly *** ************** She explained all the steps. I faced no discomfort during the treatment. Thumbs up to her and her entire team.
reply_text: Thanks Prachi for the words of appreciation. Keep Smiling :)

review: Crown & Roots is the most appropriate place for dental health problems. Dr. Mansi Khatri & Dr.kartik Datta & entire staff is very cooperative and friendly. I was very satisfied with their behaviour and the treatment provided to me. They give the best advise keeping in view all the aspects of benefits for the patient. I would highly recommend his place for maintaining dental health.
reply_text: Thanks for the positive feedback. Regards
